Fixes the check which previously broke installation on amazonlinux

Working on it, seems to a problem related to `lsb_release` not being present in every debian install, will have to find a check which can more accurately resolve if you're running on debian.

EDIT: not the case, seems we're not correctly resolving the debian version

comments.author: Geweldig
comments.body:
@TravisEz13 ~the main script pulls the install scripts for every release from the master branch, leading me to believe the debian script which is currently on master does not pass the CI. This also makes it difficult to verify the installation correctness using CI, as it won't always use the code which is actually on the branch. Verifying the script manually using the aforementioned docker command does result in a correctly installed version of PowerShell.~

Seems this isn't the case, build has been fixed.
